Key Match Events: James Rodriguez scored a penalty to seal the win for Colombia
Nico Gonzalez scored an equalizer for Argentina
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina played without Lionel Messi due to a high ankle sprain
Argentina's team was ineffective without Messi and struggled to create chances
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni's side was thoroughly outplayed by Colombia
Argentina's players were disappointing, with Enzo Fernandez having a particularly forgettable showing
Scaloni's tactics were questioned after the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: James Rodriguez was excellent on the night, scoring a penalty and creating chances for Colombia
Argentina's defense was frail at times, conceding a goal to Yerson Mosquera and a penalty to James Rodriguez
Others: Argentina's Copa America-winning XI was mostly outplayed by Colombia
Lionel Scaloni's team selection and tactics were criticized after the match
